explanation: The bug is in the second condition of the if statement. It checks s1[1] and s2[1], which may cause an index error if the input strings are shorter than 2 characters. The correct condition should be to check s1[0] and s2[0] to ensure we are checking the first character for both strings. This was fixed by changing s1[1] to s1[0] and s2[1] to s2[0].
